turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza I would like it to be a veggie lovers' with Alfredo sauce and on the second pizza I would like it to be a chicken and ranch pizza. I would like extra cheese on both of those pizzas as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 2 medium extra cheese pizzas one veggie lovers with alfredo sauce, the other a chicken and ranch for $34.99 right?

turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: cashier
